data_meta.titleEn: Request to Change Room at a Hotel
data_meta.titleKo: Request to Change Room at a Hotel

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Good evening, ma'am. How can I assist you today?

sentences.speaker: Sophia
sentences.sentence: Good evening. I've been assigned to room 201, but I'd prefer a room on a higher floor if available.

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Sure, let me see what we have.

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Yes, we do have a room available on the 10th floor. Would that be okay?

sentences.speaker: Sophia
sentences.sentence: Could I move there right away?

sentences.speaker: Robert
sentences.sentence: Of course, ma'am. Let me get the new room key for you.

sentences.speaker: Sophia
sentences.sentence: Thank you so much, Robert. This is much appreciated.

expressions.desc: Sophia가 객실 변경을 조정해준 Robert에게 깊은 감사의 의미로 이 표현을 사용합니다.
expressions.example_en: Your help with the project is much appreciated.

sentences.sentence: 안녕하세요. 저는 201호에 배정받았는데, 가능하다면 높은 층의 객실을 원합니다.
물론입니다, 부인. 새 객실 키를 드리겠습니다.
